00035 template <typename TEST> class CObservable;

00050 template <typename EventType>
00051 class CObserver 
00052 {
00053     friend class CObservable<EventType>;
00054 public:
00055     typedef CObservable<EventType> ObservableType;
00056 
00064     virtual ~CObserver();   
00065 
00066 
00067 protected:
00074     virtual void ReceiveNotification( const ObservableType* o, const EventType& e ) = 0;
00075     
00076     
00077 private:
00079     wxMutex m_mutex;
00080 
00081     typedef std::set<ObservableType*> ObservableSetType;
00083     ObservableSetType m_list;
00084 };
00085 
00086 
00087 
00091 template <typename EventType>
00092 class CObservable
00093 {
00094     friend class CObserver<EventType>;
00095 
00096 public:
00098     typedef CObserver<EventType> ObserverType;
00099 
00100 
00104     virtual ~CObservable();
00105 
00106 
00116     bool AddObserver( ObserverType* o );
00117 
00127     bool RemoveObserver( ObserverType* o );
00128 
00129 protected:
00141     void NotifyObservers( const EventType& e, ObserverType* o = NULL );
00142 
00143 
00149     void RemoveAllObservers();
00150     
00151     
00155     virtual void ObserverAdded( ObserverType* ) {};
00156     
00157     
00165     virtual void ObserverRemoved( ObserverType* ) {};
00166 
00167     
00168 private:
00170     wxMutex m_mutex;
00171 
00172     typedef std::set<ObserverType*> ObserverSetType;    
00173     typedef typename ObserverSetType::iterator myIteratorType;
00174 
00176     ObserverSetType m_list;
00177 };

00187 template <typename EventType>
00188 CObserver<EventType>::~CObserver()
00189 {
00190     wxMutexLocker lock( m_mutex );
00191     
00192     while ( !m_list.empty() ) {
00193         ObservableType* o = *m_list.begin();
00194         
00195         {
00196             wxMutexLocker oLock(o->m_mutex);
00197             o->m_list.erase( this );
00198         }
00199         
00200         m_list.erase( m_list.begin() );
00201     }
00202 }
00203 
00204 
00205 template <typename EventType>
00206 CObservable<EventType>::~CObservable()
00207 {
00208     wxMutexLocker lock( m_mutex );
00209 
00210     while ( !m_list.empty() ) {
00211         ObserverType* o = *m_list.begin();
00212         
00213         {
00214             wxMutexLocker oLock(o->m_mutex);
00215             o->m_list.erase( this );
00216         }
00217 
00218         m_list.erase( m_list.begin() );
00219     }
00220 }
00221 
00222 
00223 template <typename EventType>
00224 bool CObservable<EventType>::AddObserver( CObserver<EventType>* o )
00225 {
00226     wxASSERT( o );
00227 
00228     {
00229         wxMutexLocker lock(m_mutex);
00230         if ( !m_list.insert( o ).second ) {
00231             return false;
00232         }
00233     }
00234 
00235     {
00236         wxMutexLocker oLock(o->m_mutex);
00237         o->m_list.insert( this );
00238     }
00239 
00240     ObserverAdded( o );
00241     
00242     return true;
00243 }
00244 
00245 
00246 template <typename EventType>
00247 bool CObservable<EventType>::RemoveObserver( CObserver<EventType>* o )
00248 {
00249     wxASSERT( o );
00250 
00251     {
00252         wxMutexLocker lock(m_mutex);
00253         if ( !m_list.erase( o ) ) {
00254             return false;
00255         }
00256     }
00257 
00258     {
00259         wxMutexLocker oLock(o->m_mutex);
00260         o->m_list.erase( this );
00261     }
00262 
00263     ObserverRemoved( o );
00264 
00265     return true;
00266 }
00267 
00268 
00269 template <typename EventType>
00270 void CObservable<EventType>::NotifyObservers( const EventType& e, ObserverType* o )
00271 {
00272     wxMutexLocker lock(m_mutex);
00273 
00274     if ( o ) {
00275         o->ReceiveNotification( this, e );
00276     } else {
00277         myIteratorType it = m_list.begin();
00278         for ( ; it != m_list.end(); ) {
00279             CMutexUnlocker unlocker(m_mutex);
00280             (*it++)->ReceiveNotification( this, e );
00281         }
00282     }
00283 }
00284 
00285 
00286 template <typename EventType>
00287 void CObservable<EventType>::RemoveAllObservers()
00288 {
00289     wxMutexLocker lock(m_mutex);
00290     
00291     while ( !m_list.empty() ) {
00292         ObserverType* o = *m_list.begin();
00293         m_list.erase( m_list.begin() );
00294         CMutexUnlocker unlocker(m_mutex);
00295         
00296         {
00297             wxMutexLocker oLock(o->m_mutex);
00298             o->m_list.erase( this );
00299         }
00300 
00301         ObserverRemoved( o );
00302     }
00303 }
